title: The Dazzling Darkness
description: A secret lies buried beneath the haunting statues of Old Willow Cemetery in Concord, Massachusetts. The woods are alive with the spirits of transcendentalists Emerson, Thoreau, and Alcott. Does Elias Hatch, the reclusive cemetery keeper, know the power hiding in Old Willow?On a cold afternoon in March, a neighbor boy five-year old Henry Brooke, goes missing. His parents are frantic as hours pass with no leads.Then a police dog tracks Henry's scent inside the sprawling Old Willow graveyard.Detective Mike Balducci suspects that Elias Hatch knows the truth about what happened to the young boy. As shadowy apparitions drift through the ancient trees, Balducci will try to unravel the secrets of the dazzled faces in the darknened air in this gripping supernatural thriller.
author: Paula Cappa
